Description: Vessel. Base, inside incised in body with a palmette under a deep manganese glaze. Outside unglazed. Foot-ring drilled. Made of fritty earthenware.
Curator's comments: On this type of pottery ("Fustat Fatimid sgraffito"): U. Bongianino, "«And their figures and colours should be different»: Incised and carved glazed wares from Fatimid Fusṭāṭ in the Martin Collection (International Museum of Ceramics, Faenza)", Faenza 100 (2014) no.2, p.28-48; 101 (2015) no.2, p.8-31; 103 (2017) no.1, p.9-25
